unnormalised: Hey guys, any news on Dhawan? Hope he's recovering well after that nasty fall near Eden Gardens! Heard Dr. Sharma is optimistic. Also, is Bumrah fit for the upcoming series? That shoulder looked bad, yaar. Need him bowling those yorkers! On a lighter note, did you see Kohli's new house in Mumbai? Must be sprawling, probably like 5000 sq ft! Rs. 20 Cr easily! Hoping for some positive injury updates soon!
